reviews.review_msg: After a short lecture, he just went over the readings.  Made the class very boring.  I don't learn well by reading, so I'd never take another class with him.  When he bothered to lecture, it was fine.. Wish he'd just do that, and not rely so much on readings!

You never get the right answer with this guy. You're only ever sort of right. I shouldn't have told him someone tinkered with his website so it led to a "adult themed" room. At least he was fun to impersonate.
